title: Hhampuz
author: Hhampuz
created_time: June 08, 2022, 01:46:30 PMLast edit: June 22, 2022, 10:04:32 PM by Hhampuz
content: Win.com is a new Play-to-Earn Gaming Infrastructure for Web3 where you can instantly deply crypto rewards and NFTs in any game with two lines of code. Aiming to redefine how gamers can be rewarded for playing, this campaign will launch to get some more eyes on the project! If you are a quality poster we want to hire YOU!Rules and Requirements:Wear the Signature and Avatar.Make a minimum of 20 constructive posts each week that you participate in order to receive a payment.Posts in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, any bounty/campaign threads (including this one) or threads where your Signature is not displayed will not count towards the min. requirement.A maximum of 5 local board posts will be counted per week meaning you need to make a minimum of 15 English posts.If you have legitimate negative feedback from a DT member, don't bother applying as you will not be accepted.If you receive legitimate negative feedback from a DT member you may be removed without payment or notice.Do not participate in any other Signature/Avatar campaign during your stay here or you will be removed without payment or notice.Do not enroll your main + alt accounts in this campaign. Doing so will result in all of them being removed without payment or notice as well as a blacklist from all of my campaigns.This campaign will be open for Sr. Members, Hero Member and Legendary Members.Payments will be sent out to your bech32 BTC address each Thursday (Weeks will run from Thursdays>Wednesdays CET timezone).You need to have received a minimum of 5 merit in the last 120 days in order to join this campaign.Win.com reserves the right to make any changes and/or end the campaign at any time. Each started week will be paid out in full!I currently hold 2 weeks of the budget for this campaign, updates will be posted before the 2nd week ends on whether or not we continue for a 3rd or more.Payouts and Positions:5x Sr. Members - $50 in BTC/Week5x Hero/Legendary Members - $60 in BTC/WeekThe Signatures:Sr
